SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.kinvey
Class MappedAppdata

java.lang.Object
  com.kinvey.MappedAppdata

public class MappedAppdata
extends Object

A collection of data that implements the MappedEntity interface. This class will on occasion make calls over the network. Every method that needs access to the network has an asynchronous version to run requests in a background thread.

Usage

MappedAppdata depends requires a MappedEntity to save, query, delete data. 
 MappedAppdata items = sharedClient.mappeddata(MyItemMappedEntity.class,"dataCollectionName");
 
 items.addFilterCriteria("owner", "==", ownerListId);
 items.fetchByFilterCriteria(new ListCallback()    {
 
    public void onSuccess(List result) { ... }
 
    public void onFailure(Throwable error) { ... }
 
 });

all

public <T> List<T> all(Class<? extends MappedEntity> clazz)
            throws KinveyException
Used in special cases where the calling code would like to run the network request in its own thread. Synchronously fetches all objects stored in this collection with no filter criteria applied.

Warning: network requests should be run using a background thread. Look at using all(Class, ListCallback) instead.

Parameters:
clazz - the type of MappedEntity for which to perform the mapping, default constructor must be enabled for this work
Returns:
a collection of all objects for this entity
Throws:
KinveyException

all

public <T> List<T> all()
            throws KinveyException
Used in special cases where the calling code would like to run the network request in its own thread. Synchronously fetches all objects stored in this collection with no filter criteria applied.

KinveyException

all

public <T> void all(Class<? extends MappedEntity> clazz,
                    ListCallback<? extends MappedEntity> callback)
Uses a background thread to retrieve all objects in the is entity collection with no filter criteria applied.

Parameters:
clazz - the type of MappedEntity for which to perform the mapping, default constructor must be enabled for this work
callback - called with result

all

callback - called with result

fetchByFilterCriteria

public <T> List<T> fetchByFilterCriteria(Class<? extends MappedEntity> clazz)
                              throws KinveyException
Used in special cases where the calling code would like to run the network request in its own thread. Synchronously makes a query request to the collection using the criteria specified by any of the addFilterCriteria() calls.

Warning: network requests should be run using a background thread. Look at using fetchByFilterCriteria(Class, ListCallback) instead.

Parameters:
clazz - the type of MappedEntity for which to perform the mapping, default constructor must be enabled for this work
Returns:
a collection of matching objects for this entity
Throws:
KinveyException

fetchByFilterCriteria

public <T> void fetchByFilterCriteria(Class<? extends MappedEntity> clazz,
                                      ListCallback<? extends MappedEntity> callback)
Makes a query request to the collection using the criteria specified by any of the addFilterCriteria() calls.

Parameters:
clazz - the mapped class instance for which to fetch results
callback - triggered after the request completes

fetchByFilterCriteria

public <T> void fetchByFilterCriteria(ListCallback<? extends MappedEntity> callback)
Makes a query request to the collection using the criteria specified by any of the addFilterCriteria() calls.

Parameters:
clazz - the mapped class instance for which to fetch results
callback - triggered after the request completes

fetch

public <T> List<T> fetch(Class<? extends MappedEntity> clazz)
              throws KinveyException
Equivalent to fetchByFilterCriteria(Class). Applys the underlying query object built up by calls to addFilterCriteria or overridden via setQuery(Query) method.

Parameters:
clazz - the mapped class instance for which to fetch results
Returns:
a collection of matching objects for this entity
Throws:
KinveyException

fetch

public <T> void fetch(Class<? extends MappedEntity> clazz,
                      ListCallback<? extends MappedEntity> callback)
Equivalent to fetchByFilterCriteria(Class, ListCallback). Applys the underlying query object built up by calls to addFilterCriteria or overridden via setQuery(Query) method.

Parameters:
clazz - the mapped class instance for which to fetch results
callback - triggered after the request completes

setQuery

public void setQuery(Query query)
Overrides the query with a new Query

Parameters:
query - the new query to be used during fetch
Throws:
NullPointerException - if query param is null

clearFilterCriteria

public void clearFilterCriteria()
Empties the filter criteria holder.

See Also:
EntityCollection.clearFilterCriteria()

delete

public void delete(String id)
            throws KinveyException
Used in special cases where the calling code would like to run the network request in its own thread. Synchronously deletes the entity from the kinvey data storage.

Warning: network requests should be run using a background thread, look at using delete(String, ScalarCallback) instead

Parameters:
id - unique identifier of the object instance to delete
Throws:
KinveyException - if the request fails for any reason

delete

public void delete(String id,
                   ScalarCallback<Void> cb)
Using a background thread, deletes the entity from the kinvey data storage.

Parameters:
id - unique identifier for this entity
cb - triggered when network request completes

findBy

public <T> void findBy(MappedEntity instance,
                       String property,
                       boolean value,
                       ScalarCallback<T> callback)
Deprecated. use fetch instead

Uses a background thread to find first entity from the cloud service that matches the boolean value.

Parameters:
instance - instance of the class to involved in query
property - Name of the char field to match
value - True or false
callback - onSuccess will be called with the first entity that matches the query

Parameters:
instance - instance of the class to involved in query
property - Name of the char field to match
value - Matches the first record with this value
callback - onSuccess will be called with the first entity that matches the query

load

public <T> T load(MappedEntity instance,
                  String id)
       throws KinveyException
Used in special cases where the calling code would like to run the network request in its own thread. Synchronously loads the mapped entity instance making a request over the network

Warning: network requests should be run using a background thread, look at using load(MappedEntity, String, ScalarCallback) instead.

Parameters:
instance - object to copy the loaded properties
id - unique identifier for the entity to load out of the collection
Returns:
instance will all properties populated, existing properties will be over written
Throws:
KinveyException - if anything goes wrong with the request

load

public <T> void load(MappedEntity instance,
                     String id,
                     ScalarCallback<T> callback)
Fetches the given mapped class by id.

All properties currently loaded will be removed and replaced with the object loaded from the cloud service.

Parameters:
instance - instance of the class to involved in query
id - unique identifier associated with entity for which to fetch

save

public <T> T save(MappedEntity instance)
       throws KinveyException
Create or updates the object. Used in special cases where the calling code would like to run the network request in its own thread. Saves the current state of the mapped class to kinvey data storage.

Warning: network requests should be run using a background thread, look at using save(MappedEntity, ScalarCallback) instead.

Parameters:
instance - the instance of the class to perform the mapping during save
Throws:
KinveyException

save

public <T> void save(MappedEntity instance,
                     ScalarCallback<T> callback)
Create or update the current state of the mapped class to kinvey data storage.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of entity being saved
Parameters:
instance - the instance of the class to perform the mapping during save
Throws:
MappingException - when the MappedEntity is not properly structured
